resources.string:
This application is still in beta. I have added most of the features I intend to, so perhaps I will drop the beta tag soon.

This application generates passwords. Originally it emphasized making these passwords somewhat prounouncable. Since then, I have added a lot of features allowing the user control over numbers and special characters that could reduce that pronouncability. However, it does make the applicaiton more flexible to meet various password criteria.

As a warning, these passwords are not entirely random. The attempt to make them somewhat pronounceable reduces their random nature. That is why it generates multiple passwords at a time. Hopefully one will phonetically make a little sense.

That said, it could randomly spell a real word. I do not recommend using real words even if they were generated somewhat randomly. Strong passwords are tough, but this tool hopefully can give you some ideas to make stronger, memorable passwords.
